General.Name: Anhui Honglu Steel Construction Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Honglu Steel Construction(Group) CO., LTD manufactures and sells steel structures in China and internationally. It also is involved in the production and sale of green building materials; and steel structure prefabricated construction and general contracting business. The company's products are used in super high-rise buildings and public rental housing, commercial houses, commercial centers, large venues, industrial plants, terminal buildings, bridges, petrochemical equipment brackets, and other fields. It markets its products to approximately 37 countries. The company was founded in 2002 and is based in Hefei, China.
